name: Bestfit Mobile
description:
BestFit Mobile designs, develops, and optimizes mobile solutions for companies who want to engage their customers or utilize mobile to drive business efficiencies with leading technologies, such as Low Energy Bluetooth and iBeacon. 

We do all things mobile, with ROI in mind. If you’re looking for mobile applications and site development for iPhone, iPad, Android, Blackberry or the Next Big Small Thing, you’ve come to the right place. Need to reach customers via mobile advertising, text or SMS campaigns? With the rapid growth of mobile technology comes an opportunity for advertisers to find and engage customers in a personal way. Let us help.
